# NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.ownProcess

**Case**

A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app that is the source of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
case ownProcess
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.all**: A representation visibility specification conferring item visibility to all processes.
- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.group**: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app’s app group.
- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.team**: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to processes created by the app’s development team.

items.description: A representation visibility specification conferring item visibility to all processes.
